text: ivvare, atu, samutu (camukattaraiyum alittom); anriyum avarkal vacitta itankaliliruntu (oru cila cinnankal) unkalukkut telivaka tenpatukinrana enenil saittan avarkalutaiya (tic)ceyalkalai avarkalukku alakakak kanpittu avarkal nallarivu pataittavarkalaka iruntum, avarkalai nervaliyil (poka vitatu) tatuttu vittan
